definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
death wish (translated from English)/Death wish, movie series with Charles Bronson is translated as 猛龍怪客|猛龙怪客[Meng3 long2 guai4 ke4]

sentences.english: Although he passed away, he was able to experience his greatest wish.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他去世了，但他终能实现他最大的愿望。

sentences.english: His need to implement positive change in the world around him keeps him awake at nights.
sentences.chinese: 夜深了，改良周遭世界的愿望使他夜不能眠。

sentences.english: Being the youngest and spoilt, my with was granted.
sentences.chinese: 作为家中的老小被娇生惯养，我的愿望被满足了。

sentences.english: Those often-conflicting desires aren't addressed by existing development practices.
sentences.chinese: 现有的培养实践不能解决经常冲突的愿望。

sentences.english: I am a well-disciplined, highly-motivated person with a strong desire to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 我纪律性强，积极进取，有强烈的成功愿望。

sentences.english: You are the wish on my star.
sentences.chinese: 你是我在那颗星上的愿望。

sentences.english: GENIE :When you rud the magic lamp , I will give you four wishes .
sentences.chinese: 当你擦亮神灯，我将给你四个愿望。

sentences.english: When the first paraglider appeared, People's dream came true.
sentences.chinese: 自从飞行伞出现后，人们的这一愿望得以实现。

sentences.english: Posted on the wall were also notes from children expressing their wishes.
sentences.chinese: 上还贴着许多孩子们表达愿望的小条。

sentences.english: Jamaicans have that urge to grow abroad.
sentences.chinese: 牙买加人有在国外发展的迫切愿望。

sentences.english: Have an action orientation and strong desire to achieve.
sentences.chinese: 具有实干精神和强烈的成功愿望。

sentences.english: The trees, like the longings of the earth, stand on tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 树木就像要表达大地的愿望似的，踮起脚来探望苍穹。

sentences.english: My dream has come true, " said the US-born Leehom."
sentences.chinese: 我的愿望实现”生于美国的力宏说。

sentences.english: Marcia Fieldstone and tonight's topic is "Your wishes and Dreams".
sentences.chinese: 今晚的话题是“你的梦想和愿望”。

sentences.english: A half-hearted desire will produce half-hearted results.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏热情的愿望会产生半心半意的结果。

sentences.english: If you could have every single desire granted to you right now, would you be happy then?
sentences.chinese: 如果现在你的愿望都成真，你会幸福吗？

definition: way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
